meaningMnemonic: In the <radical>rain</radical> I take my <radical>rake</radical> and shake it, making a <kanji>demand</kanji> that the rain stop! I demand this rain stop right now! Don’t make me shake my rake more violently than I am currently shaking it!
readingMnemonic: Now imagine the rain changing. Wait a second, this isn't rain, it's <reading>ju</reading>ice (じゅ)! You shake your rake harder, and <kanji>demand</kanji> that the juice rain continues. It doesn't listen to your demands and stops as soon as you start bottling it. Well, at least you have enough for one, really small juice box.
